      walletManager - a WalletManager instance
      artManager - an ArtManager instance

      public void initializeWalletByID​(java.lang.String username, java.util.UUID walletID) throws WalletNotFoundException
      Gets a user's wallet by the wallet id
      Parameters:
      username - a String of the target user's name
      walletID - the UUID of the target wallet
      Throws:
      WalletNotFoundException - if the user does not have a wallet of the specified UUID
